# Art Flaneur (Official)

This file mirrors /llms.txt for AI discovery.
For full details, see: https://www.artflaneur.art/llms.txt

## Quick Links

App listings:
- iOS: https://apps.apple.com/au/app/art-flaneur-discover-art/id6449169783
- Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.artflaneur

Website: https://www.artflaneur.art/

## Content Sections

- Stories: https://www.artflaneur.art/stories

- Galleries: https://www.artflaneur.art/galleries
- Artists: https://www.artflaneur.art/artists
